coverpage.title: Hi, I'm Orlando Mina
coverpage.about: I am a frontend developer with experience in React. I'm good at HTML and CSS, as well as JavaScript. I love learning new things and experimenting with new technologies. I have a good eye for details and I always put my all into my work.

about.title: About me
about.text: Orlando is a frontend developer with an interest in UX/UI design. He is an expert in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React. His hobbies include music and esports.
